section.title: Programming Model Overview
section.para: [provide a programming model overview. you can check out the gridftp example.]

listitem.simpara: [most core components have autogenerated docs (javadocs, doxygen, etc) for their apis and this is where they link to them. don't know what the case is for you - if you have any api documentation, link to it here (even if it's outside the globus website) ]
